title: The Human in the Loop
description:
My journey into the world of technology began at 18—not out of convenience, but out of a fierce conviction to build a path that was entirely my own. What started as a bold, non-traditional choice has transformed into the absolute central pillar of my life. 
I am a lifelong learner fueled by a unique kind of adrenaline: the deeper the complexity, the higher my energy. While others might see a high-pressure technical bottleneck as a stressor, I see it as a playground for innovation. 
There is an unparalleled thrill in the "heart of the problem"—that electric moment when a difficult puzzle finally clicks into place. For me, that resolution isn’t just a win; it’s a total rejuvenation of my professional drive. 
I am relentlessly expanding my toolkit, always hunting for the next skill or methodology that allows me to build smarter, faster, and more elegant solutions. I don’t just want to keep up with the future; I want to help build it.
